I have a good memory, but sometimes I forget to do something. For example, last week I remembered to buy milk on my way home, when I was being late for my online meeting (Is it okay to say "I have a good memory" or it sounds a bit unnatural?)

Reply: Yes, you can say "I have a good memory" when you are talking about your ability to remember things.
